author: terencechain
content:
The security has to do with the size of the PTC, I dont think it matters too much  how validators are sampled. For 512, a 35% attacker will need 20k years

If we talk about reward, it may play a small decision factor on how PTC is sampled
1. Give PTC reward on top of beacon committee
2. Replace PTC reward for beacon committee if selected
3. Ignore reward at all
